MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G20 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:20pm. Our team have established an underground cable fault outside 8 Hathaway Street and are now arranging to restore your power as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:05pm on Saturday 20th March 2021
